alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Christian; Hopkins; McLean; Muhlenberg; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 11:44PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Muhlenberg, northwestern Christian, east central Caldwell, southeastern McLean, Hopkins and south central Webster Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1044 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Earlington, or 8 miles north of Dawson Springs, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Madisonville, Earlington and Mortons Gap around 1050 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Livermore. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 91 and 125. Western Kentucky Parkway between Mile Markers 39 and 65. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 29 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Christian; Hopkins; McLean; Muhlenberg; Webster
